scripts.build:purge: ng build --configuration production && npm run purge:css
scripts.test:all: npm run test:headless && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: npm start & SERVER_PID=$! && npx wait-on http://localhost:4200 && npm run test:node-scripts && npm run test:report && kill $SERVER_PID
scripts.test:node-scripts: node test-auth-redirect.js && node tests/test-auth-implementation.js && node tests/test-domain-lifecycle.js && node tests/test-default-status-and-counts.js && node tests/test-confirmation-form.js && node tests/test-search-focus.js && node tests/test-user-type-visibility.js && node tests/test-domain-change.js && node tests/test-domain-selection.js && node tests/test-optional-domains.js
scripts.test:cypress: npm start & SERVER_PID=$! && npx wait-on http://localhost:4200 && npm run cypress:run && npm run test:report && kill $SERVER_PID
scripts.test:scripts: node tests/test-auth-implementation.js && node tests/test-confirmation-form.js && node tests/test-search-focus.js && node tests/test-user-type-visibility.js && node tests/test-domain-lifecycle.js && node tests/test-domain-change.js && node tests/test-domain-selection.js && node tests/test-domain-selection-simple.js && node tests/test-domain-update-fix.js && node tests/test-optional-domains.js && node tests/test-default-status-and-counts.js && node tests/test-headless-demo.js && node tests/test-headless-domain-selection.js && node tests/test-headless-user-type.js && node tests/test-headless-with-auth.js && node tests/test-manual-behavior.js
scripts.css:analyze: echo 'Analyzing CSS bundle sizes...' && find src -name '*.less' -exec wc -c {} + | sort -n
